description: Refunct is a first-person platformer focused on movement and momentum.

v0.0.2.description:
See [README](https://github.com/spinerak/refunct-tas-archipelago/blob/master/README.md) for instructions and info :)

Changelog v0.0.1 -> v0.0.2
- Made it so red buttons cannot be interacted with, so no need to worry about bugging your game.
v0.0.2.title: Refunct for Archipelago v0.0.2

v0.1.0.description:
See [README](https://github.com/spinerak/refunct-tas-archipelago/blob/master/README.md) for instructions and info :)

Changelog v0.0.2 -> v0.1.0
- Ability-rando! You have to unlock the items Swim, Ledge Grab, Progressive Wall Jump (x2) and Jumppads.
- Logging back into a game will now mark all platforms you hit before.
- Two yaml options: how much grass you want to collect and what the final platform should be.
v0.1.0.title: Refunct for Archipelago v0.1.0

v0.2.1.description:
See [README](https://github.com/spinerak/refunct-tas-archipelago/blob/master/README-v021.md) for instructions and info :)

Changelog v0.2.0 -> v0.2.1
- Fixed apworld (it didn't work with other games, whoops). Apworld changed, yaml and tool are the same.

Changelog v0.1.0 -> v0.2.0
- Added an animation when goal is reached.
- Added extra option for the "final platform": random platform (either you know which one it is from the start, or you'll only figure out when you jump on it).
- Tweaked & improved logic (should be faster).
- Improved UI (you can change size in settings).
v0.2.1.title: Refunct for Archipelago v0.2.1

v0.3.0.description:
> [!CAUTION]
> This version has a bug when you disable the Seeker Minigame, please use a newer release.

See [README](https://github.com/spinerak/refunct-tas-archipelago/blob/master/README.md) for instructions and info :)

Changelog v0.2.1 -> v0.3.0
- Added two minigames to play! In them you have all your abilities. If you find the item that unlocks a minigame, you can play the minigames "Vanilla Minigame" and/or "Seeker Minigame". They are enabled by default but you can turn them off in the yaml.
- "Vanilla Minigame" let's you actually play the full vanilla game! Every button press is a check (and up to 10 of them can give you useful items).
- "Seeker Minigame" puts you in a completed world except there are 10 platforms untouched. Touching them gives you checks.
- You don't have to New Game before logging in anymore. The game will ask you to press New Game when necessary.
- Fix for Windows 11 (thanks @nielrenned).
- Added workflow to create files for linux to the release (thanks @nepcore).
v0.3.0.title: Refunct for Archipelago v0.3.0

v0.3.1.description:
See [README](https://github.com/spinerak/refunct-tas-archipelago/blob/master/README.md) for instructions and info :)

Changelog v0.3.0 -> v0.3.1
- Fixed an issue that the game crashes when the Seeker Minigame was not selected (only apworld changed).

Changelog v0.2.1 -> v0.3.0
- Added two minigames to play! In them you have all your abilities. If you find the item that unlocks a minigame, you can play the minigames "Vanilla Minigame" and/or "Seeker Minigame". They are enabled by default but you can turn them off in the yaml.
- "Vanilla Minigame" let's you actually play the full vanilla game! Every button press is a check (and up to 10 of them can give you useful items).
- "Seeker Minigame" puts you in a completed world except there are 10 platforms untouched. Touching them gives you checks.
- You don't have to New Game before logging in anymore. The game will ask you to press New Game when necessary.
- Fix for Windows 11 (thanks nielrenned).
- Added workflow to create files for linux to the release (thanks nepcore).
v0.3.1.title: Refunct for Archipelago v0.3.1

v0.3.2r2.description:
See [README](https://github.com/spinerak/refunct-tas-archipelago/blob/master/README.md) for instructions and info :)

Changelog for v0.3.2 (so many things!)
- Major UI overhaul mostly from @nielrenned
  - Text client in-game with pretty colors
  - Customize locations of UI
  - Improved login experience
  - UI now shows which minigames have checks left
  - Minigames show their progress while playing
- Two new minigames
  - OG Randomizer: the very original randomizer made by the refunct-tas team! It's like the normal game but platforms trigger in a random order.
  - Button Galore: all platforms are up and just press the buttons. Kinda like an open-world game!
v0.3.2r2.title: Refunct for Archipelago v0.3.2

v0.4.0.description:
(this is not the latest version anymore)
New version! With the following changes:
- Added many pretty and some annoying traps! (see yaml)
- Added Deathlink (adjustable in yaml and in settings) @nepcore
- Fix for music stopping when many clusters were unlocked.
- Fixed issue where you could put the font-size of the UI to 0 (lol) @nielrenned

Note:
- In the Seeker minigame, the final button&platform don't trigger anymore (unintended kinda, but it is not a check anyways so no problem).
v0.4.0.title: Refunct for Archipelago v0.4.0

v0.4.1.description:
Changes v0.4.0 -> v0.4.1
- Fix the fix for music stopping when many clusters were unlocked (make it time-based instead of frame-based)

New version! With the following changes:

- Added Deathlink (adjustable in yaml and in settings) @nepcore
- Fix for music stopping when many clusters were unlocked.
- Fixed issue where you could put the font-size of the UI to 0 (lol) @nielrenned

Note:
- In the Seeker minigame, the final button&platform don't trigger anymore (unintended kinda, but it is not a check anyways so no problem).

v0.5.0.description:
⚠️ This version seems to crash sometimes when stepping on a Lift??? ⚠️ 

New version! With the following changes:
- Cubes are now location checks in the main-game (and bigger) (and prettier) (see yaml to turn this on/off). Huge thanks to @nielrenned !!!

The previous release added many cool stuff too!
- Traps
- Deathlink
- Audio Fix

Note:
- In the Seeker minigame, the final button&platform don't trigger anymore (unintended kinda, but it is not a check anyways so no problem).
v0.5.0.title: Refunct for Archipelago v0.5.0: Cubes!

v0.5.1.description:
⚠️ this version also has a bug where random disconnects happen when you connect another client

Changes 0.5.0->0.5.1
- Maybe fixed issues that game crashes when stepping on a lift?

v0.5.0: New version! With the following changes:
- Cubes are now location checks in the main-game (and bigger) (and prettier) (see yaml to turn this on/off). Huge thanks to @nielrenned !!!

The previous release added many cool stuff too!
- Traps
- Deathlink
- Audio Fix

Note:
- In the Seeker minigame, the final button&platform don't trigger anymore (unintended kinda, but it is not a check anyways so no problem).
v0.5.1.title: Refunct for Archipelago v0.5.1: Cubes!

v0.5.2.description:
⚠️ this version also has a bug where random disconnects happen when you connect another client

New version! With the following changes:
- **Cubes** are now location checks in the main-game (and bigger) (and prettier) (see yaml to turn this on/off). Huge thanks to @nielrenned !!!

Changes 0.5.0->0.5.2
- Maybe fixed issues that game crashes when stepping on a lift?
- Made cubes smaller so that you can properly ledge grab :')

The previous release (0.4.x) added many cool stuff too!
- **Traps**
- **Deathlink**
- Audio Fix

Note:
- In the Seeker minigame, the final button&platform don't trigger anymore (unintended kinda, but it is not a check anyways so no problem).
v0.5.2.title: Refunct for Archipelago v0.5.2

v0.5.3.description:
New version! With the following changes:
- **Cubes** are now location checks in the main-game (and bigger) (and prettier) (see yaml to turn this on/off). Huge thanks to @nielrenned !!!

Changes 0.5.0->0.5.3
- Add messages why connections fail (thanks @nepcore!)
- Fixed the issue of random disconnects when another client is connected.
- Final button can be pressed in Seeker mini-game again (not a check, nice view)
- Increased minimum archipelago version to 0.6.4.
- Cubes now correctly spawn/despawn on New Game. 
- Fixed issue that game crashes when stepping on a lift.
- Made cubes smaller so that you can properly ledge grab :')

The previous release (0.4.x) added many cool stuff too!
- **Traps**
- **Deathlink**
- Audio Fix
v0.5.3.title: Refunct for Archipelago v0.5.3

v0.5.9.description:
So many changes! Let's test it a bit before the official release :3
- Added Lifts and Pipes as unlockables (thanks @nielrenned).
- That means new logic too (thanks me).
- Added better ap login error handling (thanks @nepcore).
- Added option to nerf minigames (off by default, so all minigames will have many checks now).
- Added option groups to the yaml.
- Cleaned up the code and make function have better names.
v0.5.9.title: [Test] Refunct for Archipelago 0.5.9

v0.6.0.description:
## Version 0.6.0!
- Added **Lifts** and **Pipes** as unlockables in the main game (thanks @nielrenned).
- That means new logic too (thanks me).
- Added better ap login error handling (thanks @nepcore).
- Added option to nerf minigames (off by default, so all minigames will have many checks now).
- Added option groups to the yaml.
- Removed guaranteed early items.
- Cleaned up the code and make function have better names.
v0.6.0.title: Refunct for Archipelago v0.6.0

v0.6.1.description:
## Changes:
- Improved logic, more trivial jumps should be in logic now
- Location checks are only sent once (to reduce server load)
- Fixed button 1 being enabled when no clusters are triggered
v0.6.1.title: Refunct for Archipelago v0.6.1 - mostly 🐛 fixes

v0.6.10.description:
Yet another test version before the 0.7.0 release.
This one should work with Archipelago just fine!
Most important change:
- A new extremely original minigame called Block Blitz. Please check it out and let me know if it works :3
v0.6.10.title: [Testing] Refunct 0.6.10

v0.7.0.description: New Refunct version! - This has the **Block Brawl** minigame, a completely original minigame with randomly generated blocks and 4 colors of cubes you will have to collect to send checks! Thanks @nielrenned for figuring out how to spawn cubes! - Also many other smaller improvements by @nielrenned and I. - And thanks to @nepcore for the readme update and other help! Hope you like it!
v0.7.0.title: Refunct v0.7.0 - Block Brawl Minigame!

v0.8.0.description:
## Refunct v0.8.0!
Many smaller changes this time!
- Added **cubes bags** (see yaml). Cubes are either always collectable, never or you need to collect the "Red Cubes Bag". Uncollectable cubes are black. 
- **Added 10 extra cubes** in fun locations (in pipes, in the sky, all that stuff). In the yaml you can select when (/if) you can collect those. (tip: use Universal Tracker and their name to figure out near which cluster they are located if you're stuck).
- Save progress of Block Brawl in datastorage (thanks @nepcore!).
- Rotated the blocks in Block Brawl a little bit, just for fun.
- Removed cubes from minigames where they are not checks.
- Cubes are now colored based on which Cube Bag you need for them. By default normal cubes are red and extra cubes are green.
- Did a lot of changes in how logic is stored.
- Added quite a few connections to the logic which should it more complete.
- UI now always shows grass and minigames with checks.

And I've heard there's more to come soon!
v0.8.0.title: Refunct v0.8.0

v0.8.0-TEST.description:
Hiyahello, time for a testing release of v0.8.0.
The following things have changed:
- Save progress of Block Brawl in datastorage (thanks @nepcore!).
- Rotated the blocks in Block Brawl a little bit, just for fun.
- Removed cubes from minigames where they are not checks.
- Added cube bags (see yaml). Cubes are either always collectable, never or you need to collect the "Red Cubes Bag". Uncollectable cubes are black. 
- Added 10 extra cubes in fun locations (in pipes, in the sky, all that stuff). In the yaml you can select when (/if) you can collect those. (tip: use Universal Tracker and their name to figure out near which cluster they are located if you're stuck).
- Cubes are now colored based on which Cube Bag you need for them. By default normal cubes are red and extra cubes are green.
- Did a lot of changes in how logic is stored but everything should be the same.......

And I've heard there's more to come soon!
v0.8.0-TEST.title: TESTING v0.8.0

v0.8.1.description:
## Refunct v0.8.1!
- fixed non-deterministic generations (used `set` without `sorted` whoops)
- added `self.minigames` to `interpret_slot_data` for Universal Tracker

v0.7.x -> v0.8.0
- Added **cubes bags** (see yaml). Cubes are either always collectable, never or you need to collect the "Red Cubes Bag". Uncollectable cubes are black. 
- **Added 10 extra cubes** in fun locations (in pipes, in the sky, all that stuff). In the yaml you can select when (/if) you can collect those. (tip: use Universal Tracker and their name to figure out near which cluster they are located if you're stuck).
- Save progress of Block Brawl in datastorage (thanks @nepcore!).
- Rotated the blocks in Block Brawl a little bit, just for fun.
- Removed cubes from minigames where they are not checks.
- Cubes are now colored based on which Cube Bag you need for them. By default normal cubes are red and extra cubes are green.
- Did a lot of changes in how logic is stored.
- Added quite a few connections to the logic which should it more complete.
- UI now always shows grass and minigames with checks.

And I've heard there's more to come soon!
v0.8.1.title: Refunct for Archipelago v0.8.1

v0.8.2.description:
## Refunct v0.8.2!
- added extra UI component to show info, such as warning when input is disabled (<3 @nepcore)
- added info about the mod to that UI component with useful features
- actually added support for Universal Tracker (<3 @gerbiljames)
- (no yaml changes since 0.8.0)

v0.8.0 -> v0.8.1
- fixed non-deterministic generations (used `set` without `sorted` whoops)
- added `self.minigames` to `interpret_slot_data` for Universal Tracker

v0.7.x -> v0.8.0
- Added **cubes bags** (see yaml). Cubes are either always collectable, never or you need to collect the "Red Cubes Bag". Uncollectable cubes are black. 
- **Added 10 extra cubes** in fun locations (in pipes, in the sky, all that stuff). In the yaml you can select when (/if) you can collect those. (tip: use Universal Tracker and their name to figure out near which cluster they are located if you're stuck).
- Save progress of Block Brawl in datastorage (thanks @nepcore!).
- Rotated the blocks in Block Brawl a little bit, just for fun.
- Removed cubes from minigames where they are not checks.
- Cubes are now colored based on which Cube Bag you need for them. By default normal cubes are red and extra cubes are green.
- Did a lot of changes in how logic is stored.
- Added quite a few connections to the logic which should it more complete.
- UI now always shows grass and minigames with checks.

And I've heard there's more to come soon!
v0.8.2.title: Refunct for Archipelago v0.8.2

v0.8.3.description:
# Version 0.8.3! - mostly small stuff!
## Apworld
- Fixed logic scores of block brawl if the yaml options to have multiple unlocks was one.
## Game
- Made sure some settings are not 0, like the mini-map size (of course you can still turn it off)
- Added filter for AP messages (your message default may have been reset), you can now hide server stuff and chats and connect messages.
- Lock Block Brawl minigame if it has no colors unlocked
- _Added three "The Climb" minigame courses. They are not part of Archipelago, but let me know what you think! You can find them in the "change gamemode" menu once connected to a server._
v0.8.3.title: Refunct for Archipelago v0.8.3
